title: Funerary inscription for Leontia and Kalliope
support: Triangular marble plaque. In the lower corners are two menorah and a conic figure, perhaps an ethrog.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded; probably from Catania (according to Ferrara and Noy), but possibly from the Monteverde catacomb in Rome (according to Ferrua and Korhonen).

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Torremuzza and Kaibel in Museo Biscari, later by Korhonen in magazzino superiore, collezione Biscari (formerly sala VII, 85)

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana; Photograph of front face by students of Liceo M.M. Lazzaro, 2017-04-27

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
